name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrapidoo: Your Job Search Companion for Indeed

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automates your job searches on Indeed, gather and easily view all relevant job offers in a single table.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Scrapidoo, your trusty canine companion that’s ready to dig up the best job offers from Indeed and place them right into your very own Job Quarry! Tired of scrolling through endless pages? Let Scrapidoo save you time and effort by gathering all relevant listings into one organized table.

Why Install Scrapidoo?
Scrapidoo sniffs out job listings from Indeed.com and presents them in a fun, easy-to-read format. Simply search for your desired job, activate Scrapidoo, and kick back with a cup of tea or coffee while your job-hunting pup does all the digging for you!

Key Features:
- Automatic Job Scraping: Your doggo collects job offers with a single click.
- Organized Table View: All the listings are neatly displayed for easy comparison.
- Filter Search Bar: Easily refine results by company, location, and more.
- Real-Time Progress Bar & Job Counter: Keep track of your job excavation effortlessly.
- Simple Start & Stop Controls: Manage your search session like a pro.

Why Scrapidoo Stands Out:
 - Time Saver: No more manual tracking—focus on something else while he does the work!
 - User-Friendly: Perfect for everyone, from tech-savvy users to beginners.

How to Use:
1. Install Scrapidoo from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Search for jobs on Indeed.com.
3. Activate Scrapidoo and watch your pup gather listings in real-time.
4. Use the filter options to refine your treasure trove of job offers.

Future Updates:
Scrapidoo is still a work in progress, and we know there are a few kinks to iron out. Your feedback is invaluable! If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for improvement, please leave a review or contact us directly.

Start your job search adventure—let Scrapidoo dig up the best opportunities and fill your Job Quarry today!
